properties.property: [Character [Enemy Kyla] Downward True False [Sequence [ClearSpirits [FadeOutSong 120] [Wait 120] [PlaySong 120 0 0 0.5 [Field TheCalling]] [Wait 180] [Dialog "Always. They have always treated me this way..."] [Wait 120] [Dialog "Things cannot be put right. Things can only be put in my favor..."] [Wait 120] [Dialog "You are either the spider or you are the fly..."] [Wait 120] [Dialog "A lifetime of poison is what she gave to me..."] [Wait 60] [Face [CharacterTarget [Enemy Kyla]] Leftward] [Wait 60] [Dialog "I shall give it all back to her all in one moment!"] [Wait 60] [Face [CharacterTarget [Enemy Kyla]] Downward] [Wait 60] [Dialog "Aranea's poison is tasteless and unidentifiable..."] [Wait 120] [Dialog "In my master's nightly herbal brew shall I serve it."] [Wait 60] [Face [CharacterTarget [Enemy Kyla]] Leftward] [Wait 60] [Dialog "Upon her death by morning, through the custom of succession, I will take her stead."] [Wait 60] [Face [CharacterTarget [Enemy Kyla]] Downward] [Wait 60] [Dialog "Imagine their faces when they see the lowest servant become the highest... their victim become their tormentor..."] [Wait 120] [Dialog "Things could not be put right..."] [FadeOutSong 120] [Fade [CharacterTarget [Enemy Kyla]] 150] [ReplaceAdvent [KylaAdvent 2] [KylaAdvent 3]] [PlaySong 120 0 0 0.5 [Castle CastlePart2]] [Wait 120] [PlaySound 0.5 [Field Unlatch]] [Dialog "Something unlatched..."]]] [[KylaAdvent 2]]]
